import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get ticket assets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/assets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all assets currently linked to a given ticket. Each asset record includes model metadata, serial number, and asset tag for display in ticket detail views.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to search for tickets and read `Items[].TicketId`.

**Field References**
- **TicketAssetId** is the join record identifier; use it when updating links via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/assets](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-assets).
- **AssetId** references the device record; fetch full details with [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id).
- **ModelId** and **CategoryId** identify the asset's model and category; lookup metadata via [POST /api/v1.0/issues/for/models](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-models).

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters → extract `Items[0].TicketId`.
2. Fetch linked assets: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/assets](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-assets) → iterate `Items[]` to display asset tags and models.
3. (Optional) Load full asset details: for each `AssetId`, call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id) to retrieve owner, location, and custom fields.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId (path parameter)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket whose linked assets should be returned. >
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
